CONTRACT_ID: And it would look too long for this format
short_summary: Please disregard the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time and CanadaBuys posting closing time.
description: AMENDMENT TO CLOSING TIME: Please disregard the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time and CanadaBuys posting closing time. All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted on 2023/02/10 by 2:00 PM EST. All bids submitted after 2:00 PM EST will result in the bid being declared non-responsive. Canada is seeking offers from Offerors to provide supply and delivery of DRASH Shelters (Original Equipment Manufacturer (OEM): HDT Expeditionary Systems Inc) to Department of National Defence, CFB Petawawa.
